AT.name: Bit Boy!! ARCADE
AT.description: Addictive, balanced, polished, and brilliantly executed, this game's a must own! '9.5 Magnificent PureNintendo 'It is one of the most original, beautiful and addictive games you can find in the eShop. '9.5 JugadoresEshop 'This is by far the best-looking 3DS indie title I've played to date.' 9.0 NintendoCharged KUBITASTISCH!! Kubi ist zurück und trifft diesmal auf seinen Schöpfer den Spieledesigner!! Die lustige Story erzählt dir mehr über Kubi, seine Freunde, die bösen schwarzen Schattenplättchen, das mächtige Zahnrad ZeLeLi und auch einiges über Spieleentwicklung. Spiele so schnell wie du willst und drücke Steuerkreuz und Buttons gleichzeitig so schnell du kannst! Spiele schneller für höheren Score Jump-, Bomb- und Rocket-Blöcke Grafikevolution von Welt zu Welt 50 Pergament-Achievements Über 200 verschiedene Phasen Rette 1.491 PixelFreunde Finde über 4.200 PixelFlys Nutze Spielmünzen für Continues AutoSave nach jeder Phase QuickStart ohne Logos/Ladezeiten Epische Bosskämpfe Über 1 Stunde Sprachausgabe Über 1 Stunde Musik EASY MODUS falls es zu schwer wird QUICK RUN für Zwischendurch Vergleiche HighScores im Miiverse™

BG.name: Bit Boy!! ARCADE
BG.description: Addictive, balanced, polished, and brilliantly executed, this game's a must own! ' 9.5 Magnificent PureNintendo 'It is one of the most original, beautiful and addictive games you can find in the eShop.' 9.5 JugadoresEshop 'This is by far the best-looking 3DS indie title I've played to date. '9.0 NintendoCharged KUBITASTIC!! Kubi is back, and this time he meets his creator: the Game Designer!! The fun story tells of Kubi, his friends, the evil black Shadow Plattchen, the mighty gearwheel ZeLeLi and something about game development too. Play as fast as you want by pressing the +Control Pad and the buttons together as fast as you can! Play faster for a higher score Jump, Bomb, and Rocket Blocks Graphical Evolution in every world 50 Parchment Achievements Over 200 different Phases Rescue 1,484 Pixel Friends Revive over 4,200 PixelFlies Use Play Coins for Continues AutoSave after every Phase QuickStart without loading times Epic Boss Fights Over 1 hour of voice acting Over 1 hour of music Optional EASY MODE QUICK RUN for short sessions Share High Scores in Miiverse™

BE.name: Bit Boy!! ARCADE
BE.description: Addictive, balanced, polished, and brilliantly executed, this game's a must own! '9.5 Magnificent PureNintendo 'It is one of the most original, beautiful and addictive games you can find in the eShop. '9.5 JugadoresEshop 'This is by far the best-looking 3DS indie title I've played to date. '9.0 NintendoCharged KUBITASTIQUE!! Kubi est de retour, et cette fois-ci il va rencontrer son créateur: le Game Designer! Vivez l'histoire de Kubi, ses amis, le cruel et ténébreux Plattchen, le rouage royal ZeLeLi et le développement d'un jeu. Finissez les niveaux aussi vite que possible à l'aide de la manette + et des bouttons! Finissez les niveaux le plus vite possible pour avoir le meilleur score Saut, Bombes et Blocs Rockets Evolutions graphiques dans chaque monde 5O Achievements Parchemins Plus de 200 niveaux Sauvez 1491 amis Pixel Réssucitez plus de 4200 fées Pixel Utilisez des Play Coins en guise de Continue Sauvegare automatique après chaque niveau Pas de temps de chargement Combats de boss épiques Plus d'une heure de doublage Plus d'une heure de musique Mode FACILE optionel Mode QUICK RUN pour des sessions courtes Partage des meilleurs scores sur Miiverse™

ES.name: Bit Boy!! ARCADE
ES.description: Addictive, balanced, polished, and brilliantly executed, this game's a must own! '9.5 Magnificent PureNintendo 'It is one of the most original, beautiful and addictive games you can find in the eShop. '9.5 JugadoresEshop 'This is by far the best-looking 3DS indie title I've played to date. '9.0 NintendoCharged ¡KUBITÁSTICO! ¡Kubi ha vuelto y esta vez se encuentra con su creador, el diseñador del juego! La historia te dirá más sobre Kubi, sus amigos, el malvado Shadow Plattchen, el poderoso ZeLeLi y además algo sobre el desarrollo del juego. ¡Juega tan rápido como quieras pulsando la cruz de control y los botones a la vez tan rápido como puedas! Juega rápido para romper récords Bloques de salto, bomba y cohetes Evolución gráfica en cada mundo 50 logros Más de 200 fases Más de 1.400 Pixel Amigos Revive más de 4.200 PixelFlies Usa Monedas de Juego para continuar Autoguardado tras cada fase Cargado rápido sin tiempos de carga Jefes épicos Más de 1 hora de voz Más de 1 hora de música ]EASY MODE si se pone difícil QUICK RUN para un juego rápido Comparte tus mejores puntajes en Miiverse™

IT.name: Bit Boy!! ARCADE
IT.description: Addictive, balanced, polished, and brilliantly executed, this game's a must own! '9.5 Magnificent PureNintendo 'It is one of the most original, beautiful and addictive games you can find in the eShop.'9.5 JugadoresEshop 'This is by far the best-looking 3DS indie title I've played to date.' 9.0 NintendoCharged KUBITASTICO! Kubi è tornato, e questa volta l'improbabile eroe incontra il suo creatore: il Game Designer!! La bislacca e assurda storia racconta di Kubi, il suo amico, il maligno Shadow Plattchen, la possente ruota-dentata ZeLeLi e anche qualcosa a proposito dello sviluppo del gioco. Velocizza l'azione secondo la tua volontà premendo la pulsantiera + assieme ai pulsanti per raggiungere il tuo limite! Più giochi veloce, più i tuoi punteggi saranno alti Salta, sgancia bombe e utilizza i Blocchi Razzo Evoluzione grafica in ogni mondo 50 Parchment Achievement Oltre 200 differenti fasi Recupera 1,491 Pixel Friends Resuscita oltre 4,200 PixelFlies Utilizza i Play Coins per continuare l'avventura Opzione di auto-salvataggio in ogni Fase QuickStart senza tempi di caricamento Battaglie con i boss a dir poco epiche Oltre 1 ora di doppiaggio Oltre 1 ora di musica Presente l'opzione EASY MODE Presente l'opzione QUICK RUN per quando non hai troppo tempo! Vantati dei tuoi record su Miiverse™

PT.description: Addictive, balanced, polished, and brilliantly executed, this game's a must own! '9.5 Magnificent PureNintendo 'It is one of the most original, beautiful and addictive games you can find in the eShop. '9.5 JugadoresEshop 'This is by far the best-looking 3DS indie title I've played to date. '9.0 NintendoCharged Kubitástico!! Kubi está de volta, e dessa vez ele encontra seu criador: o Game Designer!! Veja a divertida história de Kubi, seus amigos, a maligna sobra negra Plattchen, a poderosa engrenagem ZeLeLi e alguma coisa sobre desenvolvimento de jogos também. Jogue o mais rápido que você conseguir pressionando o botão direcional + juntamente com os botões rapidamente! Jogue rapidamente para uma pontuação maior Blocos de Pulo, Explosivos e Mísseis Evolução gráfica em todos os mundos 50 pergaminhos de realizações Mais de 200 fases diferentes Resgate 1.491 Pixel Friends Reviva mais de 4.200 PixelFlies Use Play Coins para Continues Autosave após cada fase Quickstart sem tempo de carregamento Épicas lutas contra chefões Mais de 1 hora de atuação de voz Mais de 1 hora de música MODO FÁCIL opcional QUICK RUN para sessões curtas Compartilhe pontuações no Miiverse™

RU.name: Bit Boy!! ARCADE
RU.description: Addictive, balanced, polished, and brilliantly executed, this game's a must own! ' 9.5 Magnificent PureNintendo 'It is one of the most original, beautiful and addictive games you can find in the eShop.' 9.5 JugadoresEshop 'This is by far the best-looking 3DS indie title I've played to date. '9.0 NintendoCharged KUBITASTIC!! Kubi is back, and this time he meets his creator: the Game Designer!! КУБИЧНО! Куби вернулся, и в этот раз он встретится со своим создателем — дизайнером игры! Эта забавная история расскажет нам о Куби, его друзьях, злодее Shadow Plattchen, могучем ZeLeLi и кое-что о разработке игр. Играйте так быстро, как только можете, нажимая кнопки направлений! Играйте быстро, чтобы заработать больше очков. Графическая эволюция в каждом мире. 50 различных достижений. Более 200 различных фаз. Спасите 1484 пиксельного друга. Возродите более 4200 пиксельных файлов. Используйте игровые монетки, чтобы продолжить игру. Автосохранение после каждой фазы. Быстрое начало игры без ожидания загрузки. Эпические битвы с боссами. Более 1 часа озвученных реплик. Более 1 часа музыки. Доступен легкий режим игры. Быстрое прохождение для коротких игровых сессий. Делитесь набранными очками в Miiverse™.
